pageProduct.name: Poise Pads Overnight 16 Bulk Pack
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Poise Pads Overnight Provide discreet protection for when light bladder leakage (LBL) occurs regularly. Holding up to 2 cups of liquid, so you remain protected to feel feminine, confident and in control.

  • 4x more absorbent than leading night-time period pads
  • Trusted and reliable LBL protection - 4 layer design quickly absorbs and locks away wetness into the super absorbent ABSORB-LOC core. 
  • Ultimate dryness and freshness - soft, quick dry cover keeps you dry and comfortable all day. Change as required. 
  • Helps eliminate odour for utmost discretion. 
  • All day comfort and security - Hourglass shaped pad conforms to natural curves of body. 
  • Individually wrapped - hygienic & discreet 
Poise Products have been voted by Australians as Reader's Digest Winner of Most Trusted Brand In Incontinence from 2017-2021.

Suitable For: Light bladder leakage and/or menstrual use.

Boxed Contents: 16 Pads

Size: 16 Pack

Directions

Please do not flush this product or packaging down the toilet.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Poly Bag + Inner wrap. This packaging is recyclable in Australia through the REDcycle Program. To find your nearest drop off location, visit www.redcycle.net.au

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 4 PELD or LDPE
